sceneDescription.title: Following the Treasure Map Through the Jungle

characters.clothing: Shirt soaked with sweat, hat protecting from sun
characters.position: At front of group with map
characters.action: Comparing map to landmarks while directing others

characters.appearance: Five rough pirates, various ages, carrying tools
characters.action: Hacking through vegetation with cutlasses and shovels

characters.position: In middle of group as prisoner

scene.mainElements: Treasure hunting party pushing through virgin jungle following cryptic map directions, mix of excitement and danger
scene.details: Ancient map in Silver's hands with markings, compass glinting, machetes clearing vines, disturbed parrots fleeing overhead, massive tree roots to climb over, sweat-soaked clothing, shovels and picks for digging, everyone alert for landmarks
scene.background: Impenetrable jungle walls, glimpses of blue sky above
scene.atmosphere: Fevered treasure hunt, greed driving men forward, hostile environment, building tension

composition.focus: Silver with map leading the desperate search
composition.depth: Back of treasure party in foreground, Silver with map middle ground, jungle path ahead background
